text:
@realDonaldTrump Tens of thousands more Americans will have died of COVID-19 because you failed to act. You crashed the economy as a result. You keep throwing gasoline on the protests & unrest while hiding in your bunker.

When the country needs a leader, you are sniveling & cowering.
